typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		MANDT as string,
		MATNR as string,
		VPSTA as string,
		PSTAT as string,
		MTART as string,
		MBRSH as string,
		MATKL as string,
		MEINS as string,
		BSTME as string,
		GROES as string,
		NORMT as string,
		BRGEW as boolean,
		NTGEW as boolean,
		GEWEI as string,
		VOLUM as boolean,
		VOLEH as string,
		RAUBE as string,
		TEMPB as string,
		TRAGR as string,
		STOFF as string,
		ETIAR as string,
		ETIFO as string,
		EAN11 as string,
		NUMTP as string,
		LAENG as boolean,
		BREIT as boolean,
		HOEHE as boolean,
		MEABM as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> MARA
source(output(
		MATNR as string,
		MAKTX as string,
		MAKTG as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> MAKT
source(output(
		MANDT as string,
		MTART as string,
		MTREF as string,
		MBREF as string,
		FLREF as string,
		NUMKI as string,
		NUMKE as string,
		ENVOP as string,
		BSEXT as string,
		BSINT as string,
		PSTAT as string,
		KKREF as string,
		VPRSV as string,
		KZVPR as string,
		VMTPO as string,
		EKALR as string,
		KZGRP as string,
		KZKFG as string,
		BEGRU as string,
		KZPRC as string,
		KZPIP as string,
		PRDRU as string,
		ARANZ as string,
		WMAKG as string,
		IZUST as string,
		ARDEL as string,
		KZMPN as string,
		MSTAE as string,
		CCHIS as string,
		CTYPE as string,
		CLASS as string,
		CHNEU as string,
		VTYPE as string,
		VNUMKI as string,
		VNUMKE as string,
		KZRAC as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> T134
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> T6WP4
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string,
		Column_9 as string,
		Column_10 as string,
		Column_11 as string,
		Column_12 as string,
		Column_13 as string,
		Column_14 as string,
		Column_15 as string,
		Column_16 as string,
		Column_17 as string,
		Column_18 as string,
		Column_19 as string,
		Column_20 as string,
		Column_21 as string,
		Column_22 as string,
		Column_23 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> T006
source(output(
		MANDT as string,
		RAUBE as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> T142
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> T6WP3
MAKT, MARA join(MAKT@MATNR == MARA@MATNR,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> jnrMARA
jnrMARA, T142 lookup(MARA@RAUBE == T142@RAUBE,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		ItemSku as string,
		ItemName as string,
		ItemDescription as string,
		InformationLabelText as string,
		DescriptiveLabelText as string,
		WarningInformationText as string,
		GradeLabelText as string,
		UniversalProductCode as decimal(18,2),
		EuropeanArticleNumber as decimal(18,2),
		GlobalTradeItemNumber as decimal(18,2),
		ItemElectronicProductCode as decimal(18,2),
		ComponentPartIdentifier as string,
		PluCode as decimal(18,2),
		EngineeringReferenceNumber as integer,
		CopyrightNumber as string,
		UlControlNumber as string,
		UlFileNumber as string,
		ItemNote as string,
		ProductId as integer,
		AssetIndicator as boolean,
		ItemLength as integer,
		ItemWidth as integer,
		ItemHeight as integer,
		LwhUomId as integer,
		ItemVolume as integer,
		ItemVolumeUomId as integer,
		ItemWeight as integer,
		WeightUomId as integer,
		ShelfLifeDays as integer,
		MinimumStorageTemperature as integer,
		MinimumStorageTemperatureUomId as integer,
		MaximumStorageTemperature as integer,
		MaximumStorageTemperatureUomId as integer,
		MinimumStorageHumidity as integer,
		MinimumStorageHumidityUomId as integer,
		MaximumStorageHumidity as integer,
		MaximumStorageHumidityUomId as integer,
		StandardQuantityUnitOfMeasureId as integer,
		StandardCost as decimal(18,2),
		ListPrice as decimal(18,2),
		StandardWholesalePrice as decimal(18,2),
		TargetReturnPrice as decimal(18,2),
		MarginAmount as decimal(18,2),
		VerbalBidsRequiredForMinimumAmountRange as decimal(18,2),
		VerbalBidsRequiredForMaximumAmountRange as decimal(18,2),
		WrittenBidsRequiredForMinimumAmountRange as decimal(18,2),
		WrittenBidsRequiredForMaximumAmountRange as decimal(18,2),
		CompetitiveBidsRequiredForMinimumAmountRange as decimal(18,2),
		CompetitiveBidsRequiredForMaximumAmountRange as decimal(18,2),
		LotSizeQuantity as decimal(18,2),
		MinimumOrderQuantity as decimal(18,2),
		MinimumStockQuantity as decimal(18,2),
		ActiveItemInventoryPeriodNumberOfDays as integer,
		PutAwayRulesStatement as string,
		EurobrandIndicator as boolean,
		StoreMixedIndicator as boolean,
		StoreToExistingItemIndicator as boolean,
		StoreToExistingLotIndicator as boolean,
		SoleSourceItemIndicator as boolean,
		SoleSourceSupplierName as string,
		LifedItemIndicator as boolean,
		InStockOutOfStockIndicator as boolean,
		HazardousMaterialIndicator as boolean,
		ActiveInventoryItemIndicator as boolean,
		EligibleForExportIndicator as boolean,
		CoManagedInventoryItemIndicator as boolean,
		RotableItemIndicator as boolean,
		ConsignmentItemIndicator as boolean,
		SerializedItemIndicator as boolean,
		TrackSerialNumberIndicator as boolean,
		RepairableItemIndicator as boolean,
		RepairPeriod as decimal(18,2),
		ItemIdentificationMethodId as integer,
		CommodityTypeId as integer,
		ItemSafetyClassificationId as integer,
		StandardStorageUnitTypeId as integer,
		SecurityLevelId as integer,
		VendorId as integer,
		FamilyGroupId as integer,
		HazardSeverityCategoryId as integer,
		DepreciationMethodId as integer,
		BarCodeId as integer,
		ItemTypeId as integer
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		ItemSku = MARA@MATNR,
		ItemDescription = MAKTX,
		InformationLabelText = ETIFO,
		DescriptiveLabelText = MAKTG,
		GlobalTradeItemNumber = EAN11,
		LwhUomId = MEABM,
		ItemVolumeUomId = VOLEH,
		WeightUomId = GEWEI,
		StandardStorageUnitTypeId = MARA@RAUBE,
		ItemTypeId = MTART
	)) ~> Item
